ygData.subject: Steamfont
ygData.msgSnippet: My secondary is a Rouge and is 9th level.  Our newbie group will be going to steamfont tonight to hunt Minatours(sp).  My bubby is playing the bard in this
ygData.messageBody:
My secondary is a Rouge and is 9th level. Our newbie
group will be going to steamfont tonight to hunt
Minatours(sp). My bubby is playing the bard in this
group and is doing quite well twisting at the young
age of 10. Teien (my main char) carries a minatour
horn and we want to get one for Jamwen. I would
also like to have an extra in the bank. The point of all this
is that I have not played in Fay and would like some
advice on steamfont zone. Any advice out there?

Teien Truescale (Raging Boars)
25 Bard Prexus
